abstract: Florida Sen Marco Rubio is scheduling appearances across Iowa in attempt to make lasting impression on voters in a critical state for 2016 presidential election; Rubio's speeches deliver mix of autobiography, optimism and thoughts about what kind of country America will be in 21st century.
lead_paragraph: Making his first extended visit to the state, Mr. Rubio gave speeches that were a mix of autobiography, self-deprecating humor and forward-looking reflection on America’s future.

headline.main: An Optimistic Marco Rubio Introduces Himself to Iowans
headline.print_headline: An Optimistic Rubio Introduces Himself to Iowans

snippet: Making his first extended visit to the state, Mr. Rubio gave speeches that were a mix of autobiography, self-deprecating humor and forward-looking reflection on America’s future.
